title: Let's try something fun! Annie or Ryze?
body: Who would you rather have mid lane? There is no wrong answer just vote in the poll below and explain why you like one or the other. Thanks for your time.

replies.body:
Would take Annie in a blind scenario, she's more consistently reliable. 

However an expert Ryze player v.s. an expert Annie player? Gimme the Ryze any day, I literally won't have to do anything and he can 1v5.

Ryze will have extreme difficulty against most mid lane match ups. Poke oriented mids (Lux, Morgana, Ziggs) will out farm and harass him. Assassin Mids (Zed, Fizz) will style all over his face and make it difficult for him to trade properly. Annie carries an extreme threat radius and a powerful garenteed all-in that ryze can't match at lvl 6.

> [{quoted}](name=0Relm0,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jRgRQOwd,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-13T20:39:58.025+0000)
>
> Ryze will have extreme difficulty against most mid lane match ups. Poke oriented mids (Lux, Morgana, Ziggs) will out farm and harass him. Assassin Mids (Zed, Fizz) will style all over his face and make it difficult for him to trade properly. Annie carries an extreme threat radius and a powerful garenteed all-in that ryze can't match at lvl 6.

Now I heard a lot of people play Ryze at top now?
While I love Ryze's character and think he needs more love, the kits is icky and Annie has more use in a team fight.
